channel.title: Need some help. thanks
channel.description:
yeah my base is delta and i was wondering how to make castle wars like pking zone but don't drop items. thought it was this at first. [code] public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) { if (Type == 1) {[/code] and for this not sure wat type 2 means. [code] } else if (Type == 2) {[/code]
if its easier use my msn, nate-420@live.com and it wuld be cool if you had teamviewer give me a real lift up :D some one give correct code, or if its in client.java already. thanks :D

item.title: Need some help. thanks
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Create a ‘cWars’ method.

public boolean inCWars() { if (absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####) { return true; } else { return false; } }

Then, find your youDied() method, and above that, add !inCWars() into the if statment.

Read full topic
